trans-unit.source: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i metodi per scrivere in un documento o una coda di stampa XPS.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> non ha un costruttore.

trans-unit.source: To create an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>, use the static <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class or use one of the static <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>, utilizzare il metodo statico <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> di classe o utilizzare uno dei statica <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> metodi del <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> classe.

trans-unit.source: The document or the queue that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> becomes the target to which it writes.
trans-unit.target: Il documento o la coda che crea il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> diventa la destinazione in cui eseguire la scrittura.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Annulla l'operazione corrente <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" />.

trans-unit.source: No asynchronous write operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Nessuna operazione di scrittura asincrona è in corso.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that can write <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> che può scrivere oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un documento o coda di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> scrive alla stessa destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> come il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> che crea il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that can write <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> che può scrivere oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> in un documento o coda di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> scrive alla stessa destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> come il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> che crea il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that specifies the default printing preferences for the document sequence.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che specifica le preferenze di stampa predefinite per la sequenza del documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for each document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per ciascun documento.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that can write <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects with <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> settings to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> che può scrivere gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> con le impostazioni <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> in un documento o coda di stampa XPS.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that writes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements with <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> settings to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> che scrive elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> con le impostazioni <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> scrive alla stessa destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> come il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> che crea il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `documentPrintTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> e valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono in un documento o una coda di stampa XPS.

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del documento di origine.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> classe ha un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> possibili <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un set di documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> nell'origine per il set di elementi <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi nel database di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> metodo verrà riserializzare specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento che consente di rimuovere tutto il contenuto dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> che non deve essere mantenuto dal [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: La riserializzazione verrà rimosse anche tutte le estensioni dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, inclusi caratteri estesi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenuto.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Per progettare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> metodo chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> evento.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene un puntatore a materiale di origine non impaginato e contiene anche i metodi per l'impaginazione del materiale.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono il contenuto impaginato da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> metodo per scrivere un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: A document that is written to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Un documento scritto in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> classe ha un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> possibili <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un set di documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> to the set.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> al set.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questo metodo per scrivere un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: A set of documents that is written to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Un insieme di documenti scritto in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> classe ha un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> possibili <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un set di documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un set di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi al set esistente.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method to write a sequence of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> metodo per scrivere una sequenza di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documenti.

trans-unit.source: A page that is written to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Una pagina scritta in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Per operazioni di scrittura batch un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method to write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> metodo per scrivere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> per un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del documento di origine.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Indicazione dell'attivazione della notifica.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono un documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` è disabilitato, il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copia serializzata[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` è abilitato, il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> prima deserializza il documento, riserializza e quindi lo scrive nella destinazione con le notifiche di stato di ogni pagina è output.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> classe ha un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> possibili <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un set di documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi nell'origine della sequenza di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi nel database di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` è specificato come <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, le notifiche vengono generate solo quando il documento è serializzato, non è stato stampato.

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: Il documento deve essere riserializzato per ricevere le notifiche.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando un documento riserializzato, tutto il contenuto del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> che non deve essere mantenuto dal [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) viene rimosso.

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: La riserializzazione verrà rimosse anche tutte le estensioni dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, inclusi caratteri estesi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenuto.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` è specificato come <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> il documento non sarà riserializzato e qualsiasi contenuto esteso verrà mantenuto, anche se vengono stampati.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Per progettare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> metodo chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> evento.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene un puntatore a materiale di origine non impaginato e contiene anche i metodi per l'impaginazione del materiale.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for material.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per il materiale.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo sincrono il contenuto impaginato da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> specificato insieme a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> nell'origine per il set di elementi <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi nel database di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> metodo verrà riserializzare specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento che consente di rimuovere tutto il contenuto dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> che non deve essere mantenuto dal [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: La riserializzazione verrà rimosse anche tutte le estensioni dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, inclusi caratteri estesi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenuto.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Per progettare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> metodo chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> evento.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene un puntatore a materiale di origine non impaginato e contiene anche i metodi per l'impaginazione del materiale.

trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questo metodo per scrivere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> per un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.target: Percorso del documento di origine.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Indicazione dell'attivazione della notifica.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specificato con opzione di notifica nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` è disabilitato, il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copia serializzata [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> che ha creato il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` è abilitato, il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> prima deserializza il documento, riserializza e quindi lo scrive nella destinazione con le notifiche di stato di ogni pagina è output.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> classe ha un nome singolare, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> possibili <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un set di documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi nell'origine della sequenza di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementi nel database di destinazione <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` è specificato come <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, le notifiche vengono generate solo quando il documento è serializzato, non è stato stampato.

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: Il documento deve essere riserializzato per ricevere le notifiche.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando un documento riserializzato, tutto il contenuto del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> che non deve essere mantenuto dal [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) viene rimosso.

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: La riserializzazione verrà rimosse anche tutte le estensioni dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, inclusi caratteri estesi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenuto.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` è specificato come <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> il documento non sarà riserializzato e qualsiasi contenuto esteso verrà mantenuto, anche se vengono stampati.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Per progettare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> metodo chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> writes a set of documents asynchronously to the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: The data that is written includes a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Includono i dati che viene scritto un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> e informazioni aggiuntive che il chiamante vuole passare a un gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The page that is written.
trans-unit.target: Pagina scritta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per la pagina.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto specificato dall'utente per l'identificazione e l'associazione dell'operazione asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> specificato insieme a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> scritto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> che rappresenta le preferenze di stampa predefinite per il documento.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto specificato dall'utente per l'identificazione e l'associazione dell'operazione asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Scrive in modo asincrono un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> specificato insieme a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: For writing multiple <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> elements, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Per la scrittura di più <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> elementi, utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un'operazione <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> viene annullata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a write operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando termina un'operazione di scrittura.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare l'evento <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica poco prima che un metodo <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> aggiunge un elemento <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> a un documento o coda di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> enables an event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one that is passed to the write operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> consente a un gestore eventi sostituire un nuovo <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> per quella che viene passato all'operazione di scrittura.

trans-unit.source: The following four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods do not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event:
trans-unit.target: I seguenti quattro <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> metodi non chiamano più il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> evento:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(String)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(String)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(Stringa, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(Stringa, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare l'evento <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>.

trans-unit.target: Il gestore dell'evento viene creato nell'esempio seguente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> updates its progress.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> aggiorna lo stato di avanzamento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and use a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged> gestore dell'evento.
